price: 39 Nul besoin, ce Jour-là, d’interroger les hommes et les djinns sur leurs péchés[1371].
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
